name: hejs
description: open-source engine with API for Real-time questions In Hebrew.

scripts.heroku-postbuild: cd client  npm install  npm run build
scripts.deploy: concurrently -m=1 "cd client && npm run build" "git add ." "git commit -m "updated"" "git push origin main" "git push heroku main"

author: Gurel Ben Shabat
